price: 33 Qu’on me les ramène. » Il se mit alors à leur trancher[1175] les jarrets et les encolures.
arabic: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسۡحَۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلۡأَعۡنَاقِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: ruddūhā ʿalayya faṭafiqa masḥan bil-sūqi wal-aʿnāqi
